Summary: Three White Lights - One Red Flashing Light
divs: sighting detailshttp:\\files.abovetopsecret.com\images\member\6cf2a7b92d9b.jpg my friend and i noticed the lights over the trees as we pulled into his driveway north of central lake near m-88 and us -31. the triangle was slowly gliding north towards ellsworth . it appeared to be flying above the chain of lakes. it was followed by a swooshing, sucking noise. it was a triangle of white lights with the wide end towards the north. the flashing red light was between the leading two white lights. we are both avid sky watchers and saw it at the same time. we watched it for a minute or so, commented on how strange it was and just went inside.we knew it was not an airplane. neither of us mentioned it to his mother for several hours. it was as if it were "normal".
